title: Nick Thomas-Symonds – 2020 Comments on Use of National Security Legislation
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nick Thomas-Symonds, the Shadow Home Secretary, on 24 September 2020.
content:
National security is the top priority for Labour and that means ensuring our security services are able to keep us safe, whilst operating within robust safeguards.
